option.name: template
template
option.value: public java.lang.String toString() { return String.format( "$classname {## #set ($i = 0) #foreach ($member in $members) #if ($i != 0)## , ## #end #if ($member.string) $member.name: \"%s\", ## #elseif ($member.char) $member.name: \'%s\'## #else $member.name: %s## #set ($i = $i + 1) #end #end }",## #set ($i = 0) #foreach ($member in $members) #if ($i != 0) ,## #end #if ($member.primitiveArray || $member.objectArray) java.util.Arrays.toString(this.$member.name)## #else this.$member.name ## #end #set ($i = $i + 1) #end ); }
